body.name: CHEFMAN Small, Compact Air Fryer Healthy Cooking, 2 Qt, Nonstick, User Friendly and Adjustable Temperature Control w/ 60 Minute Timer & Auto Shutoff, Dishwasher Safe Basket, BPA - Free, Black

FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: HEALTHY FRYING: Achieve perfect fried results with little or even no oil! Temperature range from 200°F - 400°F allows you to cook at your desired temperature, achieving a healthy, crispy, fried finish using at least 98% less oil than traditional fryers.
SPACE SAVING COMPACT SIZE: The personal size air fryer saves space on your counter and in your cabinet; perfect for any small kitchen, dorm, office, RV trips, and more!

VERSATILITY: Manual temperature control & 60-minute integrated timer lets you air-fry everything from frozen veggies, chicken & even reheat yesterday's dessert! The detachable BPA-Free basket, cool touch exterior, & auto-shutoff ensures added safety & security.
EASY CLEAN: The Black basket and tray are removable and top rack dishwasher safe, so your meal is as easy to clean as it is healthy and delicious. Basket is nonstick, so no cooking spray is required!

RESOURCES: cETL approved with advanced safety technology for long lasting durability, & 1-year warranty provided by Chefman, so you can purchase worry-free - we've got your back! For information on how to use your product, scroll down for a PDF User Guide. – RJ38-2LM
body.description: Black : COMPACT SIZE. BIG FLAVOR. Utilizing the latest advances in rapid-air technology, the Chefman Compact TurboFry™ Air Fryer circulates hot air at high speed, cooking your favorite dish and producing a crispy fried texture with little or no oil. You can make a variety of food; almost any food that is traditionally cooked in the oven can be air fried! Adjustable 60-minute timer and auto shut-off function allow you to program your fryer to achieve amazing results without overcooking your food. The 2-Quart fryer basket and tray are removable and dishwasher safe, so your meal is as easy to clean as it is healthy and delicious. The personal and compact size air fryer saves space on your counter and in your cabinet; perfect for any small kitchen, dorm room, RV trips, and more! 120 volts, 1000 watts – RJ38-2LM.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Took a chance. Pleasantly surpised.
reviews.reviewText: I've been curious about air fryers for quite awhile, but didn't want to pay a lot just to find out I wouldn't use it much. Also because I already have limited space for storage with all the other gadgets. But after reading the reviews of this small unit I decided it was worth $35 or so to see if I would agree. I've had it about a week and so far have used it every day, all for frozen items that I usually bake or microwave. I must say that everything has turned out much better using the air fryer. Everything comes out perfectly crispy and in less time and temperature than using the oven. Fries, chicken strips and wings, onion rings, battered fish, shrimp and clams were all better this way. And I swear the wings were even juicier and surprisingly more flavorful. I definitely will not be going back to the previous methods.So far I've cooked everything at 375 for 10 to 15 minutes and the results are very consistent. If something is not quite done to your liking just put it back in for a few more minutes. It is extremely easy to clean. The exhaust air is about the same as a hair dryer. The compact size makes it easy to store. Regarding the smell, I took the rubber bumpers off the grate and there was absolutely no bad odor. The controls are so simple I don't see why other units even bother with digital controls. I used the timer on my phone to compare with the manual timer on the unit and it is close enough not to matter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for 2
reviews.reviewText: This is my first air fryer and I love it!! Perfect for one or two people and not too big that it takes up a lot of space. Easy to use and so easy to clean!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best thing since sliced bread! (Just a saying....). It is especially useful for a small kitchen.
reviews.reviewText: For the price, this little 2 quart air fryer is wonderful for a single person (or two) with a small kitchen. It was on sale and for $25 it is a steal. It would still be worth it for $40. It saves time, space, cleaning and turns out a good product for everything I've tried so far - meats, potatoes, sweet tater fries of various cuts.A great starter to help figure out if air fryers or other such appliances would help you out in the kitch!JPMac

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for small spaces!!!
reviews.reviewText: A friend moved to a small apartment withLittle counter space.She loves it!!!Perfect for one or two people!!!Works great and is convenient!!!Well worth the money!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect size for single person
reviews.reviewText: this is so easy to use and exactly the size i was looking for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little air fryer. I am a single person & there is just enough room to do everything I need. I have made many good things in this fryer & have been impressed with the performance & ease in cleaning. I recommend this air fryer if there are just 1 or 2 people in your home. I am so glad I bought it for myself for Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for pathetic singles who don't know how to cook
reviews.reviewText: This is absolutely a time saver and great for one person meals. It is very small, but that's exactly what I wanted given I can quickly do another cycle should my first portion not be sufficient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small and compact for single folks with small kitchens
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as a gift for a friend. Unfortunately, the gift was not well received as my friend was very intimidated to learn a new way of cooking. She told me I needed to return it but I talked her into trying it and several days later, she called me to tell me she just made the most delicious chicken breast she's ever had. I'm guessing this means she overcame her fear of new things and is enjoying her new air fryer. Knowing how this friend reacts to change or new things, I was attracted to this little unit because it was very simple to operate and small enough for tiny apartment kitchens. I can't really give a true rating because it was purchased for a friend. I do like the simplicity of this unit and the fact that it all goes in the dishwasher. I would purchase this for myself if I didn't already have an air fryer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Awesome, and so easy to use! Great for 2 people.
reviews.reviewText: So got this air fryer just yesterday and of course we had to try it out right away. Made chicken wings and turned out as the best we have ever had, nice and crispy outside, tender and cooked through on the inside and all the fat collected underneath in the drip tray. Also did popcorn shrimp and Sweet potato rostii's from scratch with equally amazing results, made us wonder we didn't buy this sooner.

Tamaño ideal si es una comida para una o dos personas como máximo. El sabor es genial y su uso es muy simple, funciona para comidas ocasionales, no estoy muy segura de su durabilidad con uso diario.Si solo te quieres quitar las ganas de tener un airfryer y no cocinaras diario en ella es excelente compra por el precio

reviews.reviewTitle: Small and easy to use. Good for 2 people.
reviews.reviewText: This air fryer is a great buy for cooking food for myself and my wife. The container is too small to hold more. For best results items to cook should be loosely packed. For best taste lightly oil the food before putting in the fryer. Easy to use, only 2 controls, temperature and time. Container is easy to clean after use.

La freidora lleva conmigo unos 3 años y funciona perfectamente, el único inconveniente que le veo es el tiempo de cocción y la cantidad de alimento que se puede cocer, por lo que si haces papas a la francesa te tardarás más que si lo hicieras en aceite, al igual la carne, por otra parte si puede llegar a ser más saludable, el gasto de energía no es muy alto para este tamaño de freidora. Recomendado!
This product is just so easy to use. I cook for one so the size is perfect. Fries are especially the best !!
